type.name: org.gradle.api.tasks.SourceSet

method.name: compiledBy
method.description:
Registers a set of tasks which are responsible for compiling this source set into the classes directory. The paths are evaluated as per org.gradle.api.Task#dependsOn(Object...).
param:taskPaths The tasks which compile this source set.

returns:this

method.name: getAllJava
method.description:
All Java source files for this source set. This includes, for example, source which is directly compiled, and source which is indirectly compiled through joint compilation.

returns:the Java source. Never returns null.

method.name: getAllSource
method.description:
All source files for this source set.

returns:the source. Never returns null.

method.name: getClassesTaskName
method.description:
Returns the name of the classes task for this source set.

returns:The task name. Never returns null.

method.name: getCompileClasspath
method.description:
Returns the classpath used to compile this source.

returns:The classpath. Never returns null.

method.name: getCompileClasspathConfigurationName
getCompileConfigurationName
method.description:
Returns the name of the compile configuration for this source set.

returns:The configuration name

method.name: getCompileJavaTaskName
method.description:
Returns the name of the compile Java task for this source set.

returns:The task name. Never returns null.

method.name: getCompileOnlyConfigurationName
getCompileTaskName
method.description:
Returns the name of a compile task for this source set.
param:language The language to be compiled.

returns:The task name. Never returns null.

method.name: getJarTaskName
method.description:
Returns the name of the Jar task for this source set.

returns:The task name. Never returns null.

method.name: getJava
method.description:
Returns the Java source which is to be compiled by the Java compiler into the class output directory.

returns:the Java source. Never returns null.

method.name: getName
method.description:
Returns the name of this source set.

returns:The name. Never returns null.

method.name: getOutput
method.description:
SourceSetOutput is a FileCollection of all output directories (compiled classes, processed resources, etc.) and it provides means to configure the default output dirs and register additional output dirs. See examples in SourceSetOutput

returns:The output dirs, as a SourceSetOutput.

method.name: getProcessResourcesTaskName
method.description:
Returns the name of the resource process task for this source set.

returns:The task name. Never returns null.

method.name: getResources
method.description:
Returns the non-Java resources which are to be copied into the resources output directory.

returns:the resources. Never returns null.

method.name: getRuntimeClasspath
method.description:
Returns the classpath used to execute this source.

returns:The classpath. Never returns null.

method.name: getRuntimeConfigurationName
method.description:
Returns the name of the runtime configuration for this source set.

returns:The runtime configuration name

method.name: getTaskName
method.description:
Returns the name of a task for this source set.
param:verb The action, may be null.
param:target The target, may be null

returns:The task name, generally of the form ${verb}${name}${noun}

method.name: java
method.description:
Configures the Java source for this set.

The given closure is used to configure the SourceDirectorySet which contains the Java source.
param:configureClosure The closure to use to configure the Java source.

returns:this

method.name: resources
method.description:
Configures the non-Java resources for this set.

The given closure is used to configure the SourceDirectorySet which contains the resources.
param:configureClosure The closure to use to configure the resources.

returns:this

method.name: setCompileClasspath
method.description:
Sets the classpath used to compile this source.
param:classpath The classpath. Should not be null.

method.name: setRuntimeClasspath
method.description:
Sets the classpath used to execute this source.
param:classpath The classpath. Should not be null.

property.name: allJava
property.description:
All Java source files for this source set. This includes, for example, source which is directly compiled, and source which is indirectly compiled through joint compilation.

returns:the Java source. Never returns null.

property.name: allSource
property.description:
All source files for this source set.

returns:the source. Never returns null.

property.name: classesTaskName
property.description:
Returns the name of the classes task for this source set.

returns:The task name. Never returns null.

property.name: compileClasspath
property.description:
Returns the classpath used to compile this source.

returns:The classpath. Never returns null.

property.name: compileClasspathConfigurationName
compileConfigurationName
property.description:
Returns the name of the compile configuration for this source set.

returns:The configuration name

property.name: compileJavaTaskName
property.description:
Returns the name of the compile Java task for this source set.

returns:The task name. Never returns null.

property.name: compileOnlyConfigurationName
compileTaskName
property.description:
Returns the name of a compile task for this source set.
param:language The language to be compiled.

returns:The task name. Never returns null.

property.name: jarTaskName
property.description:
Returns the name of the Jar task for this source set.

returns:The task name. Never returns null.

property.name: java
property.description:
Returns the Java source which is to be compiled by the Java compiler into the class output directory.

returns:the Java source. Never returns null.

property.name: name
property.description:
Returns the name of this source set.

returns:The name. Never returns null.

property.name: output
property.description:
SourceSetOutput is a FileCollection of all output directories (compiled classes, processed resources, etc.) and it provides means to configure the default output dirs and register additional output dirs. See examples in SourceSetOutput

returns:The output dirs, as a SourceSetOutput.

property.name: processResourcesTaskName
property.description:
Returns the name of the resource process task for this source set.

returns:The task name. Never returns null.

property.name: resources
property.description:
Returns the non-Java resources which are to be copied into the resources output directory.

returns:the resources. Never returns null.

property.name: runtimeClasspath
property.description:
Returns the classpath used to execute this source.

returns:The classpath. Never returns null.

property.name: runtimeConfigurationName
property.description:
Returns the name of the runtime configuration for this source set.

returns:The runtime configuration name

property.name: taskName
property.description:
Returns the name of a task for this source set.
param:verb The action, may be null.
param:target The target, may be null

returns:The task name, generally of the form ${verb}${name}${noun}
